alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 12:44PM CST until January 09 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Clarke County in east central Mississippi... * Until 130 PM CST. * At 1244 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Barnett, or 7 miles southwest of Quitman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Quitman and De Soto around 100 PM CST. Crandall around 115 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for east central Mississippi.
